subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: In its efforts to crack down on secondary schools that give quick and easy grades to high-profile athletes, the N.C.A.A. has drawn up an initial list of 15 schools from which it will no longer accept transcripts.
snippet: In its efforts to crack down on secondary schools that give quick and easy grades to high-profile athletes, the N.C.A.A. has drawn up an initial list of 15 schools from which it will no longer accept transcripts.
